description.value:
These matching anklets and bracelets are light and comfortable and come in many fashionable styles. When activated, they produce a broad-spectrum field around your body that repels vermin, making it difficult for Diminutive and Fine vermin to make physical contact with you.

 

Advanced swarmproof bangles generate a more precise modulating field that impedes more than just vermin. You are not @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.nFBcsp5FS1Wi46Fc]{Entangled} when using advanced swarmproof bangles, and you have DR 10/— against the swarm attack of Fine creatures and DR 5/— against the swarm attack of Diminutive creatures. You also gain a +4 bonus to your AC against attacks by nanites or nanobots, such as those created by the inject nanobots spells.

 

Capacity 40; Usage 1/minute
